block.name: Date Lookup
block.description: To select a date from the calendar

block.name: Site Content
block.description: To search the entire site by content type and by keyword
block.invite: Select the type of content you want to search for, enter a keyword then press GO

block.name: Log In
block.description: To authenticate yourself giving your login and password
block.invite: Enter your Windows login and password

block.name: Log In As
block.description: To login using somebody else's credentials
block.invite: Enter the login of the person you want to log in as

block.name: Change Password
block.description: To modify a password to access this site
block.invite: For security reasons, you must enter the old password once, and the new password twice

block.name: Change Password
block.description: To modify a password to access this site
block.invite: For security reasons, you must enter the old password once, and the new password twice

block.name: Sign Up
block.description: To register a new user account giving your contact information
block.comment: This is a required step before authenticating if you have never used this site before
block.invite: To access this site for the first time, you must create a user account by signing up. Rules for login and password are displayed on the right side of this screen

block.name: Administrative Only
block.description: To modify a password to access this site without entering the password currently used
block.invite: For security reasons, you must enter the new password twice

block.name: Administrative Only
block.description: To modify a password to access this site without entering the password currently used
block.invite: For security reasons, you must enter the new password twice

block.name: Generate Random Password
block.description: To modify a password to access this site without entering that new password
block.invite: Upon submission, the specified account will receive an email including the new password to use. This password will be generated automatically

block.name: View Group
block.description: Displays the description of a user group

block.name: Edit Group
block.description: To modify this user group

block.name: Add One Member
block.description: To add one user account to this user group
block.comment: User accounts can be added one at a time

block.name: Remove One Member
block.description: To remove one user account from this user group
block.comment: User accounts can be removed one at a time

block.name: View Members
block.description: Lists the members of this user group

block.name: Add Multiple Members
block.description: To add multiple user accounts to this user group
block.comment: If you enter a user account that is already a member of this group, this user account will be ignored

block.name: Remove Multiple Members
block.description: To remove multiple user accounts from this user group
block.comment: If you enter a user account that is not already a member of this group, this user account will be ignored

block.description: To grant your transaction privileges to another person

block.description: To revoke transaction privileges you have granted

block.description: To modify an existing grant of your transaction privileges

block.name: Subscribers
block.description: Lists the user accounts receiving an email when an article or image is added or modified in this article

block.name: Subscribe User
block.description: To request an email notification to be sent to a user when an article or image is added or modified in this article
block.invite: Please note that no notification is sent for a piece of content if the classification of this content is not "same as parent article". Content related to this article is also ignored

block.name: Unsubscribe User
block.description: To stop email notifications from being sent to a user when an article or image is added or modified in this article

block.name: Subscribe Group
block.description: To request an email notification to be sent to a group when an article or image is added or modified in this article

block.name: Unsubscribe Group
block.description: To stop email notifications from being sent to a group when an article or image is added or modified in this article
